meanings: [명사] ruin, destruction, downfall, fall, [동사] be ruined, be destroyed
walk[follow, go down] the road to self-destruction
walk[take a walk] down the primrose path
be on the brink[verge] of ruin

vlive.korean: 파멸의 지름길입니다. - 그러니까 그거를... It's a shortcut to destruction. - I know, that is... 듣기 View video 모비딕(Mobidic) : <쎈마이웨이> 신입사원의 회사생활 꿀팁! 직장인 스트레스 때문에 힘들어요
vlive.english: It's a shortcut to destruction. - I know, that is...

vlive.korean: 결국에는 파멸로 빠질 가능성이 높은 면도 있다. And have a tendency to fall in deep trouble. 듣기 View video Boys Republic : 놀쟈앙~~!!!
vlive.english: And have a tendency to fall in deep trouble.

examples.korean: Civilization is on the brink of apocalypse. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 문명 세계가 파멸될 위기에 처해 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: Gambling was his ruin. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 도박이 그를 파멸로 이끈 원인이었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: She had a sense of impending doom. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 파멸이 닥쳐오고 있음을 감지하고 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She had a sense of impending doom. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The decision was to prove ruinous. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 결정은 파멸을 초래하는 것임이 드러나게 되었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
